Bar.prop.Volume.description: Sum of Amino acid volume for all residues in bar region

struct.burial_depth.description: Minimum distance from cofactor barycenter to protein surface

struct.iron_count.description: Number of iron atoms in the cofactor

struct.is_rieske.description: Binary indicator for Rieske proteins (1 if Rieske, 0 otherwise)

struct.is_hipip.description: Binary indicator for High-Potential Iron Protein (1 if HiPIP, 0 otherwise)

seq.CTDT_PolarizabilityT23.description: Distribution of atomic polarizabilities - Frequency of transitions between groups 2 and 3

property_descriptions.Log(Solubility (m at 20\u00baC)): Logarithm of solubility in moles/L at 20ºC
property_descriptions.Isoelectric point: pH at which amino acid carries no net charge
property_descriptions.nOats: Number of oxygen atoms in side chain
property_descriptions.nSats: Number of sulfur atoms in side chain
property_descriptions.nNats: Number of nitrogen atoms in side chain
